The area of nearshore waters protected was assessed as the area of marine managed areas per West Hawaii region, excluding the NOAA Marine Mammal Sanctuary Waters (NOAA Marine Protected Area (MPA) Inventory) spatial data layer available: http://geoportal.hawaii.gov/datasets/noaa-marine-protected-area-mpa-inventory).
